generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display&display=swap");*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}h1,h2{font:100% Playfair Display,serif}a{color:#0a0a0a;text-decoration:none}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:4px}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:transparent}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:rgba(0,0,0,.5);border-radius:2px}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:#aaa}h1{margin:30px 0}@media screen and (max-width:500px){h1{font-size:28px}}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){h1{font-size:48px}}p{margin:24px 0}@media screen and (max-width:500px){p{font-size:18px}}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){p{font-size:28px}}nav.overlay-nav{height:150px;position:fixed;z-index:1;background:#e8dfd8;width:100%}nav.overlay-nav #menu-button{width:128px;height:128px;background-color:transparent;border:none;outline:none;cursor:pointer;top:10px;right:10px;position:fixed;z-index:2}nav.overlay-nav #title-card{width:96px;height:96px;top:30px;left:30px;position:fixed;z-index:2;background-color:#0a0a0a;display:flex;align-items:center}nav.overlay-nav #title-card span{font:100% Playfair Display,serif;font-size:18px;color:#fff;margin-left:10px}nav.overlay-nav .overlay{width:100%;height:100%;position:fixed;left:0;top:-100%;z-index:1;background-color:#0a0a0a;display:flex;align-items:center}nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links{margin-left:8%;width:100%}nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links a{text-decoration:none;font-weight:600;color:#fff;font:100% Playfair Display,serif;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:.5px;transition:letter-spacing .25s}@media screen and (max-width:500px){nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links a{font-size:60px}}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links a{font-size:120px}}nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links a:hover{letter-spacing:10px;transition:letter-spacing .25s}nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links .side-links{float:right;margin-top:50px;margin-right:50px}nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links .side-links a{text-decoration:none;font-weight:600;color:#fff;font:100% Playfair Display,serif;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:.5px;transition:letter-spacing .25s}@media screen and (max-width:500px){nav.overlay-nav .overlay .nav-links .side-links a{font-size:18px}}@media screen and .slide,.project-content .slide{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center}@media screen and (max-width:500px){.about-content .slide,.home-content .slide,.project-content .slide{padding:20px}}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){.about-content .slide,.home-content .slide,.project-content .slide{padding:100px}}.about-content h2,.home-content .slide#slide-3 h2,.project-content .slide#slide-3 h2{font-size:28px}}.team-container{height:500px;overflow-y:scroll;padding:20px}.team-container div{display:inline-block;margin-bottom:20px}.team-container div img{border:5px solid #0a0a0a}.team-container div p{text-align:center;color:#666;font-style:italic}.services-container{width:100%;display:flex;justify-content:space-evenly}.services-container img{height:200px}.outline-light{-webkit-text-stroke:.8px #fff;-webkit-text-fill-color:transparent}.outline-dark{-webkit-text-stroke:.8px #0a0a0a;-webkit-text-fill-color:transparent}.center-btn{align-self:center;height:50px;width:300px;text-decoration:none;margin-top:30px;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;flex-direction:column;overflow:hidden}.center-btn div{font-size:28px;height:54px;width:300px;text-align:center;padding:10px 0}.center-btn div:first-child{color:#0a0a0a}.center-btn div:nth-child(2){color:#0a0a0a;background-color:#fff;transition:transform .5s cubic-bezier(.68,-.55,.27,1.55)}.center-btn:hover div:nth-child(2){transform:translateY(-54px);transition:transform .5s cubic-bezier(.68,-.55,.27,1.55)}
